Posts.EditableText: I have an exit going from one street to another. Street1 exits from the west to street2 but going back to street1 from street2 is to the south. The reason they can't be the same direction east to west is because my pictures of the street are different views. Everytime i click the box off to make a corresponding exit, it keeps coming back. The box auto checks itself after i uncheck it and leave the screen. So i keep ending up with 2 exits from each street to the same place.
Posts.HTML: I have an exit going from one street to another. Street1 exits from the west to street2 but going back to street1 from street2 is to the south. The reason they can't be the same direction east to west is because my pictures of the street are different views. Everytime i click the box off to make a corresponding exit, it keeps coming back. The box auto checks itself after i uncheck it and leave the screen. So i keep ending up with 2 exits from each street to the same place.

Posts.EditableText: This is a known bug in Quest 4.1.4 (see viewtopic.php?f=1&t=2395) - I'll fix this for v4.1.5.
Posts.HTML: This is a known bug in Quest 4.1.4 (see viewtopic.php?f=1&t=2395) - I'll fix this for v4.1.5.

Posts.EditableText: I kept messing around with it before i read the bug thing and I actually got it to work i'm not sure how but its west to the room and south back to the other room without the other exits. I'm not sure what i did.
